findings.title: AOO - Arithmetic Operation Optimization
findings.description: The `_distributeFees` function can be optimized by dividing the fee amount by 2 instead of `amount * 5 / 10`, which will improve performance and reduce execution cost.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: State variables can be declared as constant using the constant keyword to ensure that the value of the state variable cannot be changed after it has been set and decrease gas consumption.
